title: Color pallette skins in new champ select.
body:
It is either impossible or extremely unintuitive to pick color swap skins in the new champ select. I.E. Bard Bloom etc...

Either this is a bug or I'm missing something.

replies.body:
Hey Priceless Llama! 

This is a [known issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HpUTbovb-known-issues-with-new-champ-select) with the new Champion Select. We have a similar issue with ward skins. As [RiotLyte noted](https://twitter.com/RiotLyte/status/687708296648634368), this should be resolved in Patch 6.2.
